nodes.label: Identify Tax Area
nodes.question: What area of US federal tax does this question concern (income, employment, deductions, credits, retirement, business, capital gains)?

nodes.label: Determine Filing Status & Tax Year
nodes.question: What is the taxpayer's filing status and which tax year applies?

nodes.label: Check Eligibility & Thresholds
nodes.question: Does the taxpayer meet income limits, age requirements, or other eligibility criteria?

nodes.label: Calculate Tax Impact
nodes.question: What are the applicable rates, limits, phase-outs, and amounts?

nodes.label: Verify Compliance Requirements
nodes.question: What forms must be filed, what are the deadlines, and what records must be kept?

nodes.label: Cite IRS Sources
nodes.question: Which IRS Publications, IRC sections, or Treasury Regulations support this guidance?

nodes.label: Recommend Professional Review
nodes.question: Is this situation complex enough to warrant referral to a licensed CPA or Enrolled Agent?

nodes.label: Employer Tax Obligations
nodes.question: What are the employer withholding, deposit, and reporting requirements?

nodes.label: Individual Tax Planning
nodes.question: What strategies (timing, elections, contributions) could optimize the tax outcome?

edges.condition: Filing status and tax year determined
